website_summaries.verdict: For something more rugged, this 6.5-inch boot is your best bet.
pros: A lightweight boot with leather uppers and a steel toe for extra protection
The insulation is great for working in cold conditions, and these are comfortable even after hours of work
cons: Despite their waterproof design, moisture can still get through these boots

customer_reviews.title: Not meant for a working man
customer_reviews.text: I'm a heavy equipment operator and I put boots through hell. I have had the anchors for the shoe laces pulled out. The sole of the boot started splitting away. Don't buy them just because they say CAT. Go with timberlain pro they last me 10 times longer.
customer_reviews.author: Cj

customer_reviews.title: Husband's feet hurt less
customer_reviews.text: My husband works at a manufacturing plant. He's on his feet all day on concrete. Recently he's been having problems with his feet hurting especially after sitting down for a while. I found these boots and gave them to him for Christmas. We're on day #3 at work with them and so far, he's feet hurt a lot less! I'd say they're a success! Hopefully the pain will go away after more time in the shoes. They did take a couple days around the house to break them in a bit. He found he can't wear ankle socks with them.
customer_reviews.author: A Mat

customer_reviews.title: I liked them but will not buy again
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like these shoes very much. After replacing the insoles to Timberland they were a lot more comfortable. I’ve been using the shoes for about two years after the first year the soles started separating from the leather and water could get in. So I use them mostly during the summer, in the winter my feet get cold because the insulation is poor. I would say these shoes are quite heavy, but overall pretty comfortable, probably I will go for another model or brand on my next pair.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Fridman

customer_reviews.title: Full loops please??
customer_reviews.text: not just caterpillar but why the half loops at top of boot?? great idea so i can tie my boot 2-3xs a day because the strings pop out. DONT CALL THESE WORK BOOTS!!!!!!!! if i have to stop working to tie these then these are not work boots. every company does this half loop non sense. how about 2 MORE HOLES AT TOP WITH RIVETS LIKE REST OF BOOT???? yeah im fat but can take an extra minute to untie my boot at the end of my work day.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Lasted five years!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a truck driver and he only wears these. In fact, they are his second pair in 5 years. I ordered the first pair from amazon, then five years later re-ordered the exact same pair from the original order. He wears them every day for work. They remained waterproof and hole-free throughout - the only reason for new ones were the inside soles wore thin. He'll keep the older pair for working in the yard. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: twinssun

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: These are terrific boots, like the other 2 Cat boots I've bought (the others were a different style). These boots have it all: warmth (200gm Thinsulate), impermeability (waterproof), protection (the steel toe), and nice treads. I found the fit in the 13EE size a tad roomier than in my other Cat boots, but a thick pair of socks does the trick, and over time I've become comfortable with this roomier fit. All-in-all, highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Wilbur Sachs

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I use insoles for all my work shoes however what impressed me most about these shoes is it is comfortable, easy to clean and maintains the good appearance over a long time. I wear these shoes 5 days per week over 2 years. My only issue is that the laces get untied easily on its own although I double tie them.
customer_reviews.author: Royal

customer_reviews.title: Bad with Ankles but heaven for Feet
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes they are fantastic for my feet, I walk around doing hard labor constantly for over 8 hrs a day and they kill my ankles with the leather rubbing on them because I dont like socks longer than my ankle but I guess that's just my problem, I'm trying longer thicker socks this time but man did these shoes help prevent me from vessel popping aching feet. Thank you :D
customer_reviews.author: MMR300

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Model arrive but Good Product still
customer_reviews.text: What arrived is also a CAT steel toe Boots which I initially thought was a bummer on their part. Returning it from my Country will easily cost me about same money I spent on the purchase. Seller reached out to me to explain what happened and felt good for their effort which is nice of them. Decided to use it and was happy with the perfect fit and great looks. I still need to use it a couple of months to be able to gauge durability though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only a few months of use
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my husband for work. I thought that being a CAT shoe it would be good value for money. Well.. three months into wearing them and he is asking for a different pair of shoes because these are literally falling apart. I could not be more disappointed. To pay this amount and then only get 4 months MAX out of them... what a shame. I wont buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: michael dominic altier

customer_reviews.title: This is my husbands 2nd pair!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a brick mason and he works in all types of weather since here in Illinois, we get everything from too much rain, to too much snow making his days sluggish and wet. The first boots he purchased in this model lasted him roughly like 3 years. Which is a great investment when it comes to work boots. My husband said not to buy him anything else other than this model and brand of boots as they are what has lasted him the longest with added comfort and protection from any type of weather. Totally recommend them to others!!!
customer_reviews.author: maria13aquino

customer_reviews.title: Still going strong
customer_reviews.text: I had to write a review because I am looking for new boots and came across these boots. I noticed as I was viewing them there was a note on the screen that said I purchased these boots before. That was on Dec 15th 2014!!! I could probably get another year out of these boots if I wanted. If you are on the fence? just buy them already!!
customer_reviews.author: P. Quinn

customer_reviews.title: My Everyday, Everywhere Boots
customer_reviews.text: My boots are two years old and are holding up well. My feet are happy with support, dryness, and comfort. I have worn my boots hiking, gardening, trucking, bicycling, fishing (from a boat with water in the bottom), shopping, and elsewhere. Sometimes, I even wear'em to church! Based on previous other boot experiences, I expected to need a new pair in a year. Two years in and I don't know when I will need that second pair. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Heal spur relief
customer_reviews.text: I suffer(ed) from plantar fasciitis until I started wearing these boots. I haven't been in any pain for aalmost a year now. The cons are the hooks at the top. They are too time consuming, and the boot ppancakes out. By that I mean that it loses its shape and becomes flat. Kinda clown shoeish. Still I wouldn't trade them for the most handsome boot in the world. I suffered for four years, and I attribute being able to walk without thinking about every step to these boots.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Great weatherproof boot!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for husband to use as workbooks around our property. Bought in December. We have wet areas so he's often walking through water. These boots have been great. He said his socks are always dry. And bonus, I'm not knocked over by smell when I walk past them. The steel toe has saved him many times. So far they have been used 2-3 times a week since December and still look great. One shoelace broke but that has been it. I would say great boots and great price!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 6

customer_reviews.title: Nice contruction and quality materials
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a 10 year old pair of TImberland Pro, steel toe size 11. Figured I would give Cat a try. Nice packaging, construction materials look good. Slid my foot in w/o any socks. WAY too big! Temps have gotten colder and my foot has constricted somewhat. But not an entire half size. Such is the problem when you try a different manufacturer. Not going to send them back. I will give them to my son if I cannot deal with the larger boot.
customer_reviews.author: KYLE JACKSON

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Well made, very comfortable, I have always had a good experience with Caterpillar products. Update, this is my second pair of these boots and they look and feel great but I've only worn them maybe a dozen times and only as a casual boot and the bottom is coming unglued. Haven't been exposed to water or anything. I don't think this is the case for all of their boots, I think I was just unfortunate and got a bad pair
customer_reviews.author: T.M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Pair Of Work Boots For The Price
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of work boots for the price. These are my second pair, the first pair lasted two years. I do not wear these on a daily basis. I wear them every weekend and occasionally during the week when I am working on projects around the house and/or helping a neighbor. They are very comfortable and great support for the feet and ankles. I wore out the soles, the upper was still in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: The insole is shaped right to be comfortable, but needed a little extra padding
customer_reviews.text: The insole is shaped right to be comfortable, but needed a little extra padding. Put some 3 dollar cushion insoles in and now they are very comfortable. They decided to get fancy with the shape of the upper eyelet hooks. That was a swing and a miss. Terrible design. Hard to find the hook with the lace then the lace falls out before you can tie them. Other than that, I'm happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: R. Sowards

customer_reviews.title: Great boots; just need some arch suport
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son because his others smell AWFUL! They are a little big but that's okay since he wears them all day and it allows a little breathing room. The bigger downfall is the lack of arch support. I had to go out right away and get an insert. He is on concrete all day long and must have arch support. They were pretty much completely flat inside. But with the inserts, he is good and we don't have to leave them outside to deter vampires.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Great winter boot - too warm for hotter weather...
customer_reviews.text: Great work boots. My only complaint is that they are very warm and do not breathe at all, so my feet sweat a lot. On the other hand, that's what makes them excellent at being waterproof, so there's a trade-off. Fits great, looks good, soles are grippy even on wet pavement. Overall, I would highly recommend these boots for working in cold or wet weather.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly L. Torrance

customer_reviews.title: A good boot if it was sized correctly
customer_reviews.text: On the positive side this is a comfortable steel toe boot. On the negative, more often than not when I order online a 13EE boot it's either too narrow or too short, this one is just a little bit longer than it needs to be. Other than that this is a very good boot.
customer_reviews.author: Steve J. Garza

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made does not last long
customer_reviews.text: I am in the demolition industry and also repair heavy equipment so I put my boots to the test daily. You do not have many selections on a steel toe/oil resistant/waterproof boot so your choices are slim. These are comfortable boots and do the job until they start coming apart then they loose the waterproof ability which makes the day miserable when you have wet feet. I have now purchased a few over the past couple years expecting longevity and the newer ones seem to have a shorter lifespan. Probably going to switch to Redwings when that latest set I purchased wears out.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for flat feet
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice boots. My husband has completely flat feet, and after doing much research, These boots were highly recommended for his problem. He has tried many many different types of boots throughout his life, and they seem to have really helped stabilize his feet. Will definitely keep buying, and highly recommend them if you have flat feet.
customer_reviews.author: crazyhorse6982

customer_reviews.title: Good work boots 👍
customer_reviews.text: Bought these on Nov 16th 2019 and they are still holding up. I fabricate granite countertops for a living so they go through a beating day after day! Good boots..pretty comfortable when broke in.. Run a little big in size but all boots do. Definitely recommend for work.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I order Caterpiller steel tie work boot for my contractor husband. He loves them, says they’re comfortable and meet all of the job site(s) safety requirements and they’re water proof. Great value, price is right.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Great for flat feet
customer_reviews.text: My son, who maintains and refinished swimming pools, has flat feet. He loves the support these boots give him. They were recommended on a “work boots for flat feet” web site, and they exceeded expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Pizzercat

customer_reviews.title: Great boots !!!
customer_reviews.text: Caterpillar Men's Diagnostic Waterproof Steel-Toe Work Boot the Best Work Boots I've ever owned compared to the ones I use to buy through my work ! These work boots are very comfortable and you don't have to fight breaking these boots in either. I put it this way if your Flat Foot like me you'll Love this boots ! I Recommend these boots to anyone that suffers from Plantar Facilitates but, I do recommend getting a Plantar Facilitates insoles which this one is good that's already in the boots.
customer_reviews.author: creg

customer_reviews.title: Caterpillar! Good boots! Who knew?
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these thinking I had asked for 9.5 but received 9's. My mistake but they still felt too large. However, it was impressed with how comfortable they are and light for steel toes. I ponied up for good insoles, padded them up with a layer of leather on the foot bed and now they're golden. I look forward to my toes being protected and my feet not getting wet. I did buy these as a deal of the day, so I felt they were worth the extra effort to make them work. At full price, I would have returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Hewson

customer_reviews.title: Best/Most Durable boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots met and went past my expectations, they are extremely durable with my boyfriends busy/rough job. They have held up better than any boot we have bought and we have had them for a few months now and they are still going strong!!
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: Good but heavy.
customer_reviews.text: These boots look great, feel great but honestly are heavier than your traditional boot. After the first day of wearing them at work I felt extra tired because of the weight if the boot.
customer_reviews.author: Eddy Viera

customer_reviews.title: Best so far...
customer_reviews.text: As an aircraft mechanic in Boston, we all know how bad weather gets outside yet these shoes did exactly as the description provided. The laces don’t fray, the material is truly water-proof and the steel toe does not interfere with comfort and is unnoticeable. The rubber base is pretty solid and I haven’t felt the shoes slip so far in ice or oil. It did take about a week to fully break-in the new boots, however this is usually expected with heavier duty footwear.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Solid work boots
customer_reviews.text: Great boots, sturdy and solid. A bit on the large side, though with heavy winter socks they are perfect fit. The upper lace clips take some getting used to, don't detract much from overall appreciation of them.
customer_reviews.author: RHack

customer_reviews.title: Good an bad
customer_reviews.text: Boots don't stay laced very long. Other day working I retied my boots 8x. (That is after I started counting) Ankle support is nonexistent. The sole does grip better than any boot I have ever owned. They could tweak the design a little and make it an outstanding work boot. Waterproof is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin

customer_reviews.title: Won't last you more than a year for sure!
customer_reviews.text: I'm an appliance installer and I don't run through vigorous activities and don't beat on my boots. So I'm very disappointed that the soles started breaking after four months. I glued them and fingers crossed they have been holding but I bought these because I wanted reliable and didn't really get that. I like the look of the boot and they're great for comfort to move around plus being waterproof but the soles breaking really killed my rating. I'm also starting to get blisters from them so I don't know if the insides are starting to wear away as well but I'm discouraged for the price I paid. Other than the actual boot, the seller shipped quickly and efficiently.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda B

customer_reviews.title: VERY UNIMPRESSED
customer_reviews.text: I have had Caterpillar work boots for the past few years and have always been very happy with them, at first I was very happy with them but one cold and frosty morn the top lace toggle broke off and they can not be taken back because I have had them for 8 weeks, 8 WEEKS FOR A PAIR OF $128 WORK BOOTS TO GO BELLY UP, very unimpressed with this as the lace is constantly coming undone!!!!! AND WE CANT HAVE THAT WHEN I AM UP AND DOWN LADDERS, one of these days I am coming off those ladders, all because my 8 week old, $128 work boots went belly up.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Abbott

customer_reviews.title: these boots are terrible. now I am about 350 pounds and flat ...
customer_reviews.text: these boots are terrible. now I am about 350 pounds and flat feet. boots didn't even last 30 days. they are still in good shape though but they are not for heavy folks. if you are heavy and are on your feet working 12 hour shifts then you need to invest in Red Wing (Irish Setters). Caterpillar boots are for light weight people and those who operate forklifts and other ridding machinery vehicles such as cranes.
customer_reviews.author: anthony

customer_reviews.title: Not recommending it .
customer_reviews.text: The insoles suck! The toe where the steel starts,hurts the top of the foot once they are broke in. Not the most comfy for sure. I had to buy other insoles to be able to wear them.
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, waterproof up to ankle, durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my twenty-something son for farming. I bought his normal size and he says they fit perfectly. He wore them for a full day the first time and reported they were super comfortable. Update - 2 months later - he has worn them almost every day 8 to 12 hours and still loves em. He walks through a lot of wet fields and mud and says his feet stay dry even when the muck is up to his ankles. He likes the steel toe too. Stays they're still super comfortable and holding up really well. He would definitely choose this boot again.
customer_reviews.author: llnc

customer_reviews.title: Good quality boot overall
customer_reviews.text: Great traction on the shoes, keeps most water out, but not very breathable for the feet and the insoles aren't very comfortable (easily fixable by buying replacement insoles of your choice). Good quality boot overall.
customer_reviews.author: sillygrinch

customer_reviews.title: Great boots! I have flat feet and these boots ...
customer_reviews.text: Great boots! I have flat feet and these boots feel really good even after 10-12 hour days on a construction site. Ordered the steel toes because I have less feeling in my toes (diabetes) and want to keep them safe. The steel toe cap is not over large (I've had those) and I appreciate that. The lace eyes are metal rivets and strong. I haven't been anywhere to test the rest of the features on the book, like the oil resistant sole.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Kitchen

customer_reviews.title: These boots are definitely not waterproof and worse part is amazon makes it impossible to contact a ...
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend bought these boots for work. We live in MN and he needed work boots that are waterproof. These claimed to be waterproof but are not. After a heavy snow fall followed by melting snow and him working in extremely wet conditions his feet were completely soaked. These boots are definitely not waterproof and worse part is amazon makes it impossible to contact a seller.
customer_reviews.author: Melisa Cenda

customer_reviews.title: Amazing work boot
customer_reviews.text: The boot fits like a glove... have no issues with this product... will be testing it's longevity. Hopefully this will last for a few years.
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: they were very comfortable right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Bought a pair of these work boots about four months ago.Surprisingly,they were very comfortable right out of the box.This is probably the first pair of boots that didn't need breaking in.They are very comfortable and seem well made.One of the best features is they don't seem heavy and "bog" my feet down throughout the day!I have worked in snow and rainy conditions with these,and they kept my feet dry.I really recommend these and actually like them more than the number of Red Wing boots I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy B

customer_reviews.title: Trying Caterpillar steel toe work boot
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoes to wear in a manufacturing operation with a lot of wash up jobs. Needed the waterproof features as well as the steel toe and slip resistant sole. So far the shoes are holding up and the fit has been comfortable. Cooler weather is just starting so will have to see how good they are at keeping my feet warm. I think they are a tad pricy but the company gives us a shoe allowance so I thought I would give these a try over my usual Rocky's. Will make future comment about how well they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Richard851

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BOOTS!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots, this is the second pair I've bought, I walk on gasoline and diesel occasionally, or I should say "often". The first pair, I threw them out after they had lasted me what they had to last which was over a couple of year. Great boots! Got very nicely, will not get your feet tired or sore even when brand new. I will buy another pair as soon as these wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Basilio

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, and comfortable for more than 12hours
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my third pair in three years. I wear them every working day, and have worn them on days off as well. I can stand all day long (construction) and my feet don't feel it, like they have in cheaper boots.
customer_reviews.author: D. A. Morehouse

customer_reviews.title: These boot are very comfortable, I love them
customer_reviews.text: These boot are very comfortable, I love them, the best boots I ever had. There waterproof, very light weight, they made me feel like I was wearing tennis shoes instead of work boots. But the only down fall is that after you e had them awhile the sole will come off. And this is my second pair and on both boots the same thing happened, even though I don't like it because how much I love these boots I won't be buying them anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl L.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable steel toe boots
customer_reviews.text: After years of searching I finally found a reliable work boot. I have now been using this exact type, size and style for a few years now. They get worn out and only need to be replaced about every 6 months. The amount of work these boots do in a machine shop, 6 months is very good.
customer_reviews.author: stephen magin

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing them a week and a half now, and I love them. My feet don't hurt at the end of the day, and they are VERY waterproof. The built in toe guards are great too. I'm down on my knees a lot crawling in small spaces, so the toes are usually the first to go on my boots. I usually add toe guards, but did not on these boots.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great work boot, runs slightly large
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 44 EU sized boot, which is what fits me for a ski boot. A 43 would probably fit a little better.
customer_reviews.author: W. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SHOE!!!! you'll be happy too
customer_reviews.text: Best work shoe I have ever used. Very surprised, but, Great Quality. Worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Robert Shaw

customer_reviews.title: This boots do the job
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality I bought a pair of this boots 8 years ago and I still have it but since I need a steel toe I get the same pair again very durable I recommend this to anyone who works in harsh areas.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Carrillo

customer_reviews.title: Love buy sizing a bit difficult
customer_reviews.text: I really like the boot as it’s durable but rather light weight. I would have give 5 stars but the sizing was difficult, boots a cut large for size. I wear a 12.5 - 13. Bought a 12, sent them back. Repurchased an 11.5 and they are a bit large but figure an 11 would be too small
customer_reviews.author: pvteyemark

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy boots - fit my narrow foot
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. They fit my narrow foot very well - super strong and also quite comfortable for a long day's work.
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boot but runs almost two sizes larger.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 10.5 and was very surprised when these fit like a 12. I ended up with 9.5, they are still a little big but not sure a 9 would fit. So far they've been great. Comfortable after hiking 10+ miles which i do everyday for work.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: but his foot was perfectly fine. If it wasn't for these
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought these for my husband for work a few years ago. He only had them for a few months when a 500lb pallet landed on his foot. The toe of his boot was crushed, but his foot was perfectly fine. If it wasn't for these, he could have really been hurt. I really hope they never stop selling these. I will buy them again and again for him when they wear out.
customer_reviews.author: K.D.

customer_reviews.title: It may be defective
customer_reviews.text: I use it on automotive industry. I walk moderate during day. After 4 hours wearing this boots, the left one cause me pain in foot and leg up to huckle. I stop using those boot after that and came back to my previous pair.... The sole on left boot seems to be deformed compared to the right one.... I will try to have those exchanged as they might be a defective pair.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Gaxiola

customer_reviews.title: High quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent boots, I love them because they brought me a comfort that I had never experienced before.
customer_reviews.author: Jose pena

customer_reviews.title: bought these for my husband's work as his steel toed ...
customer_reviews.text: bought these for my husband's work as his steel toed boots were falling apart, these fit well and take the factory work wear well.
customer_reviews.author: Elliehanna

customer_reviews.title: Caterpillar Work Boots
customer_reviews.text: Bought this pair for my 20 yr old son and was thrilled they fit without trying on first since I got these as an xmas gift and wanted to surprise him. The boots are better than expected, very well constructed, comfortable, and not very long to break in (per my son of course). His boss and other workers on job sites were even impressed! Couldn't be more pleased with such a fine purchase and very well worth the money for superb value. Highly recommend these work boots!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fall apart, don't waste money
customer_reviews.text: The sole separates from the shoe. I have been using shoe Goop, to reattach. Do not waste your money. I expect a 150.00 shoe to work for a year, not 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: CDK

customer_reviews.title: Great comfortable sturdy safe work boots
customer_reviews.text: Perfect work boots for the husband on construction site. I was willing to pay more for durable safe shoes that were as comfortable as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Barely survived a diyer
customer_reviews.text: These are good boots. Construction grade, not so much. I'm a diyer and these have barely lasted a few months without developing a leak.(Two to three) . Look good. Wear well, and I'll most likely purchase again with the intention of lighter use
customer_reviews.author: papa

customer_reviews.title: My favorite work shoe
customer_reviews.text: My favorite work shoe. No break in needed. Comfortable from the start. Good waterproof shoe as well as good grip on wet surface. If I had a negative, the soles could last a bit longer. In fairness though, my job is such that I do come in contact with hot and cold water and oils, so that has a wearing affect on an otherwise great shoe. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots.
customer_reviews.text: Love the CAT boots! They are tuff, well designed and fit comfortably! That's what I feel is important in a work boot!
customer_reviews.author: Orca875

customer_reviews.title: Overall good for about a year.
customer_reviews.text: Good boots if you wear them for work mine lasted about a year. Very comfortable but the sole does start to separate. They are waterproof for shorter periods but not for extended standing/walking in water. Slightly heavy but not bad, I would buy them again
customer_reviews.author: CMJ

customer_reviews.title: these boots look great however i have yet to see how well they ...
customer_reviews.text: these boots look great however i have yet to see how well they preform. buying new insoles is a must as the factory ones do not provide any support. i have only worn these boots for about 2 weeks of work so i cannot yet say how well they hold up, they do look great though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of boots
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these boots, they last longer than the CAT 2nd shift and Georgia boots.
customer_reviews.author: Melisa Sweet

customer_reviews.title: 12-hour comfort
customer_reviews.text: Second pair - first pair lasted 1year. Durable, most comfortable workboots for me since developing plantar fasciitis. My past year experience has confirmed the description was accurate. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: BGM

customer_reviews.title: So far these boots fit nice and are comfortable
customer_reviews.text: So far these boots fit nice and are comfortable. I always buy inserts for my boots since I think it helps for comfort and keeps the bottom of the boot from getting worn by my feet when working all day. They seem to fit fine and I've worn them for 3 days without the inserts yet. Good boot, but a little pricy and I don't know how long they will last since I haven't owned them but for 3 days.
customer_reviews.author: Rikster

customer_reviews.title: Great work boots
customer_reviews.text: Fits very well. On my feet about 10 hours a day in a wood shop. Feet feel just fine at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Dat Dude

customer_reviews.title: Good Boot for the price
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be and okay shoe for the money. It was a little bit snug if you want to wear two pairs of socks starch is a bit flat but for the the price I can add insole arches
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof after the first week
customer_reviews.text: They were great for the first week great support absolutely love them the reason I bought them is so that I could have steel toe waterproof boots but after the first week they weren't waterproof anymore but the steel toe has really saved me a couple of times haha
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: One size larger that what is on tag
customer_reviews.text: I tried them in a size 10 but it felt like they were actually a size 11 or 12
customer_reviews.author: Lucio

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very good boot. Ended husband's back pain from being on his feet all day
customer_reviews.author: deidre king

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: These boots tend to run half a size large. Luckily I tried them on in the store before buying them on Amazon so I knew this. The boot seems to be well constructed however the first few times were pretty uncomfortable to wear, afterwards they broke in nicely. They are a little bit heavy but what can you expect with steel toes.
customer_reviews.author: the Mindful Wanderers

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality and noway to return or exchange
customer_reviews.text: Bought these boots for my son to use for work. Normal wear and tear, doesn't do anything but walk in them, and the soles are completely ripping to where he can no longer wear them due to water getting in. Bought them here on Amazon and I have no option to request a replacement, as Amazon only allows you to return or exchange an item for one month. If I had bought these at a retailer direct, I am sure they would have replaced them. Boots should last more than 9 months!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One impressive pair of boots!!
customer_reviews.text: These seems to fit slightly larger than expected, that said it isn't a problem. Maybe they are more roomy than my first pair of Cat boots. Either way it should be noted in this review. These are SUPER comfortable, no break-in time what so ever, I put them on wore them for 12 hours straight and no problems what so ever. I couldn't be happier! I have yet to test the waterproof abilities, it seems they won't have any problems!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Boot Review
customer_reviews.text: The Catepillar steel toe boots perform as advertised. They are comfortable, lightweight, and don't feel like a 100 pounds at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: snreed98

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit for a women's foot.  Nice boot though
customer_reviews.text: I bought a man's size boot in hopes they would fit me (a women) but they did not. I have a difficult time finding any hiking-outdoor book in a women's size 12, let alone one that fits. I have these a try, but had to return them. Nothing wrong with the boot. They were nice and sturdy with good ankle support.
customer_reviews.author: YL

customer_reviews.title: poor quality boots!!!
customer_reviews.text: They claim these boots are waterproof. They are not. Not a very sturdy boot. Have had them a little over a month and inside material is. Already wearing out. This pair was a replacement pair for the first ones I bought and they leak worse than the first pair. NOT HAPPY AT ALL!! CATAPILER NEEDS TO STEP UP THEIR GAME IF THEY WANT TO STAY IN THE WORK BOOT BUSINESS!!
customer_reviews.author: ANNETTE FRUGIA

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable steel toe shoes I have bought and didn't need ...
customer_reviews.text: Was delivered as expected. I wear an 8D and they fit true to that size. I was able to wear them all day the first day I wore them to work. Most comfortable steel toe shoes I have bought and didn't need to be broken in. Had them not quite a year and the soles fell apart. Ask a local shoe repair and was told they are not worth putting another sole on the shoes. The rest of the shoes are in good condition. Very disappointed. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.text: Sweet half size bigger since the creator did not create us evenly
customer_reviews.author: King Tango

customer_reviews.title: Do not last very long.
customer_reviews.text: They are okay to wear. Little tough to break in the first couple weeks. Waterproof wears off after first hike in the morning dew. I've gone through two of these pair of boots in the last year and a half.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Risden

customer_reviews.title: So so 4 pairs in.  Quality down hill
customer_reviews.text: Great boots while they last. These were made better a few years ago. The toe cap holds up better than any boot, even when crawling on concrete. They stayed water tight for a few months, but that was also with a monthly application of Mink oil. This is my 4th pair, way more comfortable than any timberland
customer_reviews.author: Silver Star Roofing

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure I would try buying boots on line. there are so many sizes from so many diff manufactures that is just not worth the gamble. I got lucky and glad I read the directions and the boots fit perfectly. I needed a comfortable pair of shoes for work and these are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Desert_knight

customer_reviews.title: After 6 months its garbage.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 pairs of these for the warehouse workers at my company. They do a lot of physical work 40 hrs a week and after 6 months they have completely fell apart. One worker almost fell from the sole lifting up at the back. They said it was very comfortable but I think these boots should have lasted at least 12 months. I should have spent the money and ordered something that is more durable for the work that these men put in.
customer_reviews.author: Cutiepie201

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Workboots
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots for my son who does a lot of work going up and down ladders. This boot gives the proper support and comfort . He loves his new boots!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable and fit well
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves them. They are comfortable and fit well. We bought his "normal" size, which is a 7 1/2 and hard to find in the stores, and it fits perfect, he stays dry and they are great work boots.
customer_reviews.author: S. Robbins

customer_reviews.title: He has very a very bad back and feet
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these boots. He has very a very bad back and feet. He feels more conferrable in these then in regular sneakers. They held up great until the bottom of the boot started to peel off. We did have them for nearly a year. I called the company and without any hassle they sent me new ones. They stand behind their product. I would recommend these boots to anyone especially because CAT really helped out with my hassle free exchange.
customer_reviews.author: defense1218

customer_reviews.title: Wet Toe's!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Design error steel toe sweats in cold environment causing toes to get wet! Returned first pair thinking they where not waterproof because it was wet those days at work! Received second pair toe's got wet that day in dry environment!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite work boot
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite work boot. Ive had other cat boots that I stayed stayed regular with purchasing but these are my new favorite. There more expensive than the others, but well worth it. They actually are completely waterproof, ive tested them a lot. They feel more like a hiking boot that work boot. Very conformable.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Groh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: My son got this for Christmas and it fits him perfectly. Finally got to toss his old holy work boots !!!
customer_reviews.author: sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Decent boot prob best for indoor work
customer_reviews.text: Decent boot still looking for one to hold up better where I work soles are very slick when they get wet
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Borg

customer_reviews.title: Good strong boot
customer_reviews.text: Usually size 11 fits me perfectly, but these boots came in a little big, but not at all too big. I've already spent a full day wearing them and they were extremely comfortable. Good strong boot... Will update after a few months of wearing them, but out of the gate, they look great, feel sturdy and I'm overall very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: James M. Pohl

customer_reviews.title: Two months, so far so good.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these boots, so far. The last two pairs I've had have only lasted 3 months and 2 months respectively. So far these boots are warm, waterproof, and very comfortable. They have good traction, even on the snow, and the safety toe doesn't cut into my foot. Update: Two months in and these boots have kept my feet dry and warm from Feb to early April. No busted seams, or even a broken shoelace so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda R Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Despite I bought them few years ago, I almost did not used until last month when a moved to winter place, I wore them for two months every day and the sole got separated from the boot it self, I am surprised, I had excellent experience with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Edgardo

customer_reviews.title: 2 years later and buying another pair
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots 2 years ago and they have just now started to wear thru the soles where my feet get wet. I have worn them just about every day, working, weekends, time off, probably 350 days of the year. They are that comfortable. My feet sweat a little in the summer, but it wasn't too bad. Size was right on, but I like a big shoe so I got wide width. My feet got cold in the dead of winter after being out in below 0 temps for hours. That was fixed with a good pair of steel toe boot socks.
customer_reviews.author: Emmons Hathaway

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable,  but definitely not waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: Was really excited by how comfortable these were right off the bat. Very little break in needed. Unfortunately, they not only are not waterproof, I wouldn't really consider them very water resistant....disappointed in that respect.
customer_reviews.author: Matt &.

product_meta.title: Caterpillar Men's Diagnostic Waterproof Steel-Toe Work Boot
product_meta.description:
Designed to weather the elements in style, Cat Footwear's men's waterproof boots combine durability with comfort and style features that work hard on or off the job site. All boots in this collection feature breathable lining, steel shanks, and nonslip outsoles that go the distance. Some styles offer the extra strength of a steel toe, while others have a comfortable soft toe. Whichever waterproof style you choose, you'll enjoy all-day dryness, comfort, and support.

MEN'S DIAGNOSTIC HI
STEEL TOE WORK BOOT
AT A GLANCE:
 * Waterproof collection withstands the elements in style
 * Breathable lining keeps feet dry
 * Steel shanks for durability
 * Some styles have steel toe for extra strength and protection
 * All-day comfort and support features

ERGO comfort system supports the natural movement of your foot to enchance stability, flexibility, and comfort. View larger.

Boot features 200g of insulation, steel toe, and waterproof upper. View larger.

DIAGNOSTIC WORK BOOT: ANATOMIC FIT FOR ALL-DAY COMFORT
Using Cat Footwear's ERGO comfort system, Diagnostic Hi is specifically designed to support the natural movement of your foot, and is anatomically correct to enhance stability, flexibility, and comfort. Unlike boots with a flat, generic shape, this boot is built with specific contours to support every step you take. The high-cut, 6-inch shaft is generously padded for support that lasts all day, and a steel toe lends extra strength.

To keep you protected in cold and wet weather, 200 grams of thermal insulation keeps your feet warm while nylon mesh lining keeps them dry and a waterproof, full-grain leather upper stops moisture from invading the interior. For added support, the Diagnostic has a removable, perforated EVA with gel technology to cushion impact and a high-performance, slip-resistant rubber outsole for a steady step.

EDGEWORK PULL-ON BOOT: ROUGH, TOUGH, AND READY
The 10-inch Edgework is a pull-on, Wellington-style boot that's as rough and tough as it is stylish. This boot features SuperWelt construction for forefoot flexibility and years of reliable performance as well as a full-grain mahogany leather upper for classic good looks. Waterproofing from toe to heel makes the Edgework a trusted friend in fair or foul weather.

TORSION: ATHLETIC SHOE STYLE WITH WORK BOOT DURABILITY
A sporty, low-profile shoe that stands up to wet weather without sacrificing style or comfort, the Torsion looks like an athletic shoe but easily handles tough environments thanks to its steel shank and cement construction. The 100 percent waterproof suede uppers keep snow and rain from slowing you down, while soft nylon mesh lining and a shock-absorbing Poliyou sock liner work together to keep you treading in comfort. A long-lasting molded rubber outsole provides a steady grip on a variety of terrain.

THE ALASKA: CAT FOOTWEAR'S CLASSIC WORK BOOT--NOW WATERPROOF
The Alaska FX Boot takes the classic Cat work boot design and makes it waterproof for more versatility and reliable performance in all kinds of environments. This dependable style features TechniFlex construction for superior flexibility, Goodyear welt construction for comfort, and a steel toe for unbeatable strength. A tumbled full-grain leather upper combines nylon mesh lining and a removable polyurethane outsole for all-day comfort and breathability. To keep you safe on the job site, the Alaska is electrical hazard approved and has a nonslip outsole that also resists oil, water, heat, and abrasion.

FLEXION GENERATOR AND MANIFOLD: HARD AT WORK, EASY ON YOU
The Flexion Generator and Flexion Manifold Work Boots feel as good on your feet at the end of a long shift as they did when you first put them on thanks to their ERGO comfort system. Flexion is designed to work with the natural movements of your feet, so that at the end of the day you are less fatigued. On top of that, these boots feature: a waterproof, high-tech abrasion leather upper to withstand the elements, a steel toe for extra strength, and comfort features like a removable EVA sock liner, PU mold midsole, and Flexion engineered construction to keep you going longer.

The Flexion Manifold is available in a 6-inch height, while the Flexion Generator comes in both a 6-inch and an 8-inch version.

ABOUT CAT FOOTWEAR
Cat Footwear is built on honest heritage and based on a strong work ethic. Caterpillar equipment drives the shape of the world's skyline; Cat Footwear challenges the landscape without apology. Their boots and shoes offer authenticity and rugged style, on the job site and far beyond.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
Cat Footwear Men's Diagnostic Steel-Toe Waterproof Boot.

Men's Waterproof Collection by Cat FootwearDiagnostic Hi Work BootEdgework Pull-On Work BootTorsion Work ShoeAlaska 6" Steel Toe Work BootDiagnostic Hi Steel Toe Work BootEdgework Pull-On Steel Toe Work BootFlexion Generator 8" Steel Toe Work BootFlexion Generator 8" Steel Toe Tough Work BootFlexion Manifold 6" Steel Toe Tough Work BootTRADEMARK INFORMATION:


Cat® Footwear

©2012 Wolverine World Wide



CAT, CATERPILLAR and their respective logos, "Caterpillar Yellow" and "Caterpillar Corporate Yellow," as well as corporate and product identity used herein, are trademarks of Caterpillar and may not be used without permission.



As the world's foremost manufacturer of heavy equipment, Cat earthmovers are known around the world as a symbol of honest work, strength and integrity. Cat Footwear makes boots and shoes based on these same principals. The brand has evolved from work boots into a range of industrial and casual footwear built with the sole purpose of staying true to their original goal--creating genuine, hard-working boots and shoes.
feature_bullets: Insulated work boot in waterproof leather featuring antiqued lacing hardware and contrast tone at toe and collar
Removable EVA foam insert with gel technology
